name: Affairs 3D: Silly Secrets
description:
Jump from one conflict to another with Affairs 3d.

Flirt with two people at the same time or higher.
Don't let your spouse find out your desire.
Hide your silly secrets to avoid disaster.
Let’s hope you are not the father.

- Thrilling Gameplay
- Multiple fun minigames
- Plenty of different experiences

P.S. We don't recommend doing these in real life! It's just a game!
